NumberOfCountriesInWhichEntityOperates.label: Number of Countries in which Entity Operates
NumberOfCountriesInWhichEntityOperates.description: The number of countries in which the entity operates as of balance sheet date.

NumberOfReportableSegments.label: Number of Reportable Segments
NumberOfReportableSegments.description: Number of segments reported by the entity. A reportable segment is a component of an entity for which there is an accounting requirement to report separate financial information on that component in the entity's financial statements.

NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
NumberOfStatesInWhichEntityOperates.description: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

OciBeforeReclassificationsBeforeTaxAttri.label: OCI, before Reclassifications, before Tax, Attributable to Parent
OciBeforeReclassificationsBeforeTaxAttri.description: Amount before tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttrib.label: OCI, before Reclassifications, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttrib.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments, of other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to parent.

OperatingLossCarryforwards.label: Operating Loss Carryforwards
OperatingLossCarryforwards.description: Amount of operating loss carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, before tax and after adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Reclassifications, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeReclas.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossBeforeTaxPor.description: Amount before tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivatives Qualifying as Hedges, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativesQ.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTax.description: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPeri.description: This element represents Other Comprehensive Income or Loss, Net of Tax, for the period. Includes deferred gains or losses on qualifying hedges, unrealized holding gains or losses on available-for-sale securities, minimum pension liability, and cumulative translation adjustment. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Before tax amount of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI on Derivatives, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income of accumulated gain (loss) realized from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTax.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) allocated to other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Sale of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for gains or losses realized upon the sale of securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives Arising During Period, before Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedGainLo.description: Amount before tax of increase (decrease) in accumulated gain (loss) from derivative instruments designated and qualifying as the effective portion of cash flow hedges and an entity's share of an equity investee's increase (decrease) in deferred hedging gain (loss).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherExpenseOfInsuranceEntities.label: Other Expense of Insurance Entities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherExpenseOfInsuranceEntities.description: The sum of other expenses reflected on the income statement of the insurance company.

OtherExpenses.label: Other Expenses
OtherExpenses.description: Amount of expense classified as other.

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherPolicyholderFunds.label: Other Policyholder Funds
OtherPolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholders for funds held that are returnable under the terms of insurance contracts, classified as other.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, Additional Credit Losses
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which a previous OTTI was recognized and the investor does not intend to sell the debt security and it is not more likely than not that the investor will be required to sell the debt security before recovery of its amortized cost basis.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Additions, No Previous Impairment
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: This item represents an increase to the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings for an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) of a debt security held for which no such other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was previously recognized.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Credit Losses on Debt Securities Held
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: The cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (a component of shareholders' equity).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.label: Other than Temporary Impairment, Credit Losses Recognized in Earnings, Period Increase (Decrease)
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentCreditLosses.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the cumulative amount of credit losses recognized in earnings related to debt securities held for which a portion of an other than temporary impairment (OTTI) was recognized in other comprehensive income (loss).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Available-for-sale Securities
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount by which the fair value of an investment in debt and equity securities categorized as Available-for-sale is less than the amortized cost basis or carrying amount of that investment at the balance sheet date and the decline in fair value is deemed to be other than temporary, before considering whether or not such amount is recognized in earnings or other comprehensive income.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other-than-temporary Impairment Loss, Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Recognized in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount, before tax, of other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment loss (OTTI) on investments in available-for-sale and held-to-maturity debt securities, recognized in other comprehensive loss and attributable to parent entity.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Loss, Investments, Portion in Other Comprehensive Loss, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent, Available-for-sale Securities
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) on investment in available-for-sale debt security, recognized in other comprehensive loss, attributable to parent entity.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Portion Recognized in Earnings, Net
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: The amount of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) losses on equity securities, OTTI related to credit losses on debt securities, and OTTI losses on debt securities when the entity intends to sell the securities or it is more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell the securities before recovery of its amortized cost basis. Additionally, this item includes OTTI losses recognized during the period on investments accounted for under the cost method of accounting.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Reclassification Adjustment of Noncredit Portion from Held-to-maturity to Available-for-sale Securities, before Tax
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) related to factors other than credit loss transferred from held-to-maturity to available-for-sale securities.

OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.label: Other than Temporary Impairment Losses, Investments, Reclassification Adjustment of Noncredit Portion Included in Net Income, Availabe-for-sale Securities, before Tax
OtherThanTemporaryImpairmentLossesInvest.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustment for other than temporary impairment (OTTI) related to factors other than credit loss on a previously impaired investment in available-for-sale debt security.

PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentInvesting.label: Payments for Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
PaymentsForDerivativeInstrumentInvesting.description: The cash outflow for derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrum.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrum.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromOtherInvestingAct.description: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Available-for-sale Securities
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: The cash outflow to acquire debt and equity securities not classified as either held-to-maturity securities or trading securities which would be classified as available-for-sale securities and reported at fair value, with unrealized gains and losses excluded from earnings and reported in a separate component of shareholders' equity.

PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.label: Payments to Acquire Limited Partnership Interests
PaymentsToAcquireLimitedPartnershipInter.description: Cash outflow related to the acquisition or continued holding of limited partnership interests held for investment purposes.

PaymentsToFundPolicyLoans.label: Payments to Fund Policy Loans
PaymentsToFundPolicyLoans.description: The initial funding or additional funding of loans receivable to policy holders principally secured by the benefits under the policy.

PolicyChargesInsurance.label: Policy Charges, Insurance (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
PolicyChargesInsurance.description: An amount that an insurer adds to a policy's premium, or deducts from a policy's cash value or contract holder's account, as compensation for services rendered; may include fees.

PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Net
PolicyholderBenefitsAndClaimsIncurredNet.description: Amount, after effects of policies assumed or ceded, of expense related to the provision for policy benefits and costs incurred.

PolicyholderFunds.label: Policyholder Account Balance
PolicyholderFunds.description: Amount due to policyholder. Includes, but is not limited to, unpaid policy dividend, retrospective refund, and undistributed earnings on participating business. Excludes future policy benefit and claim expense.

PremiumsNetLifeInsuranceInForce.label: Premiums, Net, Life Insurance in Force (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
PremiumsNetLifeInsuranceInForce.description: Amount, after premiums ceded to other entities and premiums assumed by the entity, of life insurance in force premiums.

PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.label: Prior Period Reclassification Adjustment
PriorPeriodReclassificationAdjustment.description: The amount of a reclassification adjustment made to prior period financial statement amounts.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfPolicyLoans.label: Proceeds from Collection of Policy Loans
ProceedsFromCollectionOfPolicyLoans.description: The cash inflow associated with the collection of policy loans receivable.

ProceedsFromContributedCapital.label: Proceeds from Contributed Capital
ProceedsFromContributedCapital.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received by a corporation from a shareholder during the period.

ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestin.label: Proceeds from Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromDerivativeInstrumentInvestin.description: The cash inflow provided by derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.label: Proceeds from Income Tax Refunds
ProceedsFromIncomeTaxRefunds.description: The amount of cash received during the period as refunds for the overpayment of taxes.

ProceedsFromInsurancePremiumsCollected.label: Proceeds from Insurance Premiums Collected
ProceedsFromInsurancePremiumsCollected.description: Cash received as payments for insurance premiums during the current period.

ProceedsFromInterestReceived.label: Proceeds from Interest Received
ProceedsFromInterestReceived.description: Interest received on loans and other debt instruments during the current period.

ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.label: Proceeds from Limited Partnership Investments
ProceedsFromLimitedPartnershipInvestment.description: Cash inflow received as distributions, returns of capital, or sale proceeds from partnership interests held for investment purposes.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Equity
ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Available-for-sale Securities
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of debt and equity securities classified as available-for-sale securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfTradingSecuritiesHeldf.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt and Equity Securities, FV-NI, Held-for-investment
ProceedsFromSaleOfTradingSecuritiesHeldf.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of securities classified as trading securities and held for investment purposes. Excludes proceeds from trading securities purchased and held principally for the purpose of selling them in the near term (thus held for only a short period of time).

ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.label: Proceeds from Sales of Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.description: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include one or more investments, are sold to third-party buyers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate proceeds from all asset sales that are classified as investing activities.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.label: Reclassification from Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income, Current Period, Net of Tax
ReclassificationFromAccumulatedOtherComp.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss).

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, before Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodBef.description: Amount before tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

ReinsuranceCostsAndRecoveriesNet.label: Policyholder Benefits and Claims Incurred, Assumed and Ceded
ReinsuranceCostsAndRecoveriesNet.description: Amount of recovery (expense) related to provision for policy benefits and costs incurred for policies assumed and ceded.

ReinsurancePayable.label: Reinsurance Payable
ReinsurancePayable.description: The carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the known and estimated amounts owed to insurers under reinsurance treaties or other arrangements.

ReinsuranceReceivablesCaseBasis.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Case Basis
ReinsuranceReceivablesCaseBasis.description: The sum for all reinsurance arrangements of the known and estimated amount recoverable as of the balance sheet date from a given reinsurer for claims paid or incurred by the ceding insurer and associated claims settlement expenses for each reinsurance arrangement (or, the sum of all cases determined individually, probably applying different assumptions to each arrangement).

ReinsuranceReceivablesPaidLossesRecovera.label: Reinsurance Receivables (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
ReinsuranceReceivablesPaidLossesRecovera.description: Amount after valuation allowance currently billed or billable under reinsurance contracts.

ReinsuranceRecoverables.label: Reinsurance Recoverables, Including Reinsurance Premium Paid
ReinsuranceRecoverables.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts including premium paid under reinsurance contracts. Examples include, but are not limited to, settled and unsettled claims, incurred but not reported losses, loss adjustment expense, premium paid, policy benefits and policy reserves.

ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.label: Reinsurance Recoverable for Paid Claims and Claims Adjustments
ReinsuranceRecoverablesOnPaidLosses.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, recoverable under reinsurance contracts for losses reported to and paid by the ceding insurer.

ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyAmountRetained.label: Reinsurance Retention Policy, Amount Retained
ReinsuranceRetentionPolicyAmountRetained.description: Stated amount that is the upper retention limit per entity policy.

RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.label: Related Party Transaction, Amounts of Transaction
RelatedPartyTransactionAmountsOfTransact.description: Amount of transactions with related party during the financial reporting period.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RelatedPartyTransactionRate.label: Related Party Transaction, Rate
RelatedPartyTransactionRate.description: Identify the stated interest rate per the agreement, for example, leasing and debt arrangements between related parties.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

Revenues.label: Revenues
Revenues.description: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

SecuritiesForReverseRepurchaseAgreements.label: Securities for Reverse Repurchase Agreements
SecuritiesForReverseRepurchaseAgreements.description: The carrying value of securities purchased to be resold in reverse repurchase transactions as of the balance sheet date.

SecuritiesLoaned.label: Securities Loaned
SecuritiesLoaned.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of securities loaned to entities in exchange for collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

SeparateAccountAssets.label: Separate Account Asset
SeparateAccountAssets.description: Amount of asset at fair value held for benefit of separate account policyholder.

SeparateAccountsLiability.label: Separate Account, Liability
SeparateAccountsLiability.description: Amount of liability for variable contract in which all or portion of contract holder's funds is allocated to specific separate account and supported by assets held in separate account.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments without Regulatory Approval
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Capital and Surplus, Balance
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryCap.description: The amount of statutory capital and surplus (stockholders' equity) as of the balance sheet date using prescribed or permitted statutory accounting practices (rather than GAAP, if different) of the state or country.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Net Income Amount
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryNet.description: Amount of net income for the period determined using accounting principles prescribed or permitted by insurance regulators.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Taxes Payable
TaxesPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for statutory income, sales, use, payroll, excise, real, property and other taxes.

TradingSecuritiesDebt.label: Debt Securities, Trading
TradingSecuritiesDebt.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading).

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Securities
UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.label: Present Value of Future Insurance Profits, Net
ValueOfBusinessAcquiredVOBA.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of present value of future profits of insurance contract acquired in business combination.

WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.label: Withdrawal from Contract Holders Funds
WithdrawalFromContractHoldersFunds.description: The cash outflow for a segregated fund account during the period.
